title: Pixel 5 Latest updates cant connect to 802.1x protected wifi Cisco WLC 2504 and Microsoft NPAS
content:
Tried importing my root ca and a user certificate then i go to the network put in TLS 
then for the ca certificate it does not have my root certificate showing up as an option to select but the wifi cert is there and the user cert i select the one i uploaded
it wont let me connect what do i do?
